entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
